utility

Class EmailUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.EmailUtility

  • public class EmailUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class sends email messages for the registry.

      • sendMail

        public static boolean sendMail(java.lang.String to,
                               java.lang.String from,
                               java.lang.String subject,
                               java.lang.String body,
                               boolean bodyIsHTML,
                               java.lang.String emailPassword,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This method takes the given parameters and uses them to send an email from a host email address to a recipient's address.
        Parameters:
        to - the recipient's address
        from - the mailer's address
        subject - the subject line
        body - the message body
        bodyIsHTML - a boolean indicating if the body is HTML
        emailPassword - the user-provided email password
        request - the HttpServletRequest object
        Returns:
        the status of the operation

      • sendBatchMail

        public static boolean sendBatchMail(java.util.ArrayList<Patient> emailPatients,
                                    java.lang.String from,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<EmailMessage> messages,
                                    boolean bodyIsHTML,
                                    java.lang.String emailPassword,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This method takes the given parameters and uses them to send a batch of email reminders to multiple patients from a host email account.
        Parameters:
        emailPatients - the list of patients
        from - the mailer's address
        messages - the list of messages
        bodyIsHTML - a boolean indicating if the body is HTML
        emailPassword - the user-provided email password
        request - the HttpServletRequest object
        Returns:
        the status of the operation
